reviewGeneral.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Elizabat... sorry, Elizabeth Pendragon was the best assassin in the game that dominated the Ranked PVP for months. Sadly, her good days are over because she doesn't do enough damage to instantly kill the targets that matter in the current state of the game - Awakened Employees. She's also blind as a bat and often misses her attacks and you just end up staring at the screen because somehow Sylvia survived ten knifes thrown into her face, and stunned your whole team.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In PVE while she can be used as a pure damage dealer, that's all she does, so she also isn't used that much anymore.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

pros.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"- can be deployed further down the field,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"- good damage.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

cons.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"- but not enough to kill Awakened employees,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"- blind as a bat,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"- Defender can absorb valid hits from her attacks and this makes her do little damage.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

description.description: A Ranged attacker who is capable of forward deployment and AoE attacks.

introduction.introduction:
Elizabeth Pendragon is an attacker who freely roams the battlefield to perform area attacks.

　Prydwen is a secret intelligence agency that has been rumored for a long time. The only truth in all the rumors about this organization is that the Chief of Prydwen has always used the name Pendragon throughout the years.
　Descended from a reputable family, Elizabeth is the shining example of noblesse oblige, giving up her peaceful life to serve the royal family and the public.
　Handling artifacts from the Counterside is not an elegant job, but she gracefully solves all the challenges she faces at work.　The only flaw is that she is doing everything out of groundless confidence. Other agents think of this confident lady as a pretty Tea Bomb.

pve.set: Spectral Bullet/Chain with Anti-Ranger/Sniper subs, OR Melee Damage ATK/CDMG Britra Relics
pve.notes: EE is garbage, do not bother with it. Hit accessories are extremely important.

pvp.set: Spectral Bullet/Chain with Anti-Ranger/Sniper subs, OR Melee Damage ATK/CDMG Britra Relics
pvp.notes: EE is garbage, do not bother with it. Hit accessories are extremely important.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Throws several daggers at a target.
Creates and throws knives to keep enemies at bay. Inflicts AoE damage on her deployment spot, and then moves back.
Repeatedly throws knives, inflicting AoE damage. This skill only affects as many targets as its Valid Hits, and decreases DMG Taken by 50% for its duration.

level5.level5: Valid Hits +1, DMG Taken -80% for skill duration instead

baseDescription.baseDescription: Materializes her family's heirloom sword on a nearby target, inflicting AoE damage. Stuns the targets for 5 seconds.
